resource.chars:
Report on <u>Dr. Radcliffe’s<\u>
paper By Mr 
<u>Huxley <\u>
In expressing an opinion 
as to Dr. Radcliffe’s paper 
I would beg to discriminate 
between the hypothesis 
of muscular contraction which 
he advocates and 
the matter and manner 
of the argument by which 
he endeavours to demonstrate 
its validity
